Coinone API Documentation

Coinone API documentations

  • Compare all with predecessor
  • show up to version:
  • 0.1.10
  • 0.1.9
  • 0.1.8
  • 0.1.7
  • 0.1.6
  • 0.1.5
  • 0.1.4
  • 0.1.3
  • 0.1.2
  • 0.1.1
  • 0.1.0

URL

https://api.coinone.co.kr/

About Public API

  • Public information.

HTTP Method

  • GET Method

Rate Limit

  • 300 requests per minute

If you make more requests than the above notice, you will be blocked for 10 minutes. 

{
    "result": "error",
    "errorCode": "4",
    "errorMsg": "Blocked user access."
}

About Private API

  • Account API
  • Order API
  • Transaction API

Rate Limit

  • 10 requests per second

If you make more requests than the above notice, you will be blocked for 10 minutes. 

{
    "result": "error",
    "errorCode": "4",
    "errorMsg": "Blocked user access."
}

V1 version

V1 API needs V1 version of ACCESS TOKEN . To generate the key, go to the API Page .

HTTP Method

  • POST and GET Method

V2 version

V2 API needs V2 version of ACCESS TOKEN and SECRET KEY . To generate keys, go to the API Page .
APP SECRET and SECRET KEY are SAME at App API. ETH and ETC APIs are only supported in V2.

Nonce

Nonce is positive integer like unix timestamp. To prevent replay attack , user needs to provide the nonce which is increased for each request.

HTTP Method

  • POST Method

HTTP Content-Type

  • application/json

HTTP Header

  • X-COINONE-PAYLOAD
  • X-COINONE-SIGNATURE

Generate X-COINONE-PAYLOAD

PAYLOAD = BASE64(JSON(body))

Create JSON string from a parameter object(include a nonce value). 

import simplejson as json
import time

param = {
  'access_token': ACCESS_TOKEN,
  'price': 500000,
  'qty': 1.1234
  'nonce': int(time.time()*1000)
}

#to json
json_param = json.dumps(param)

Encode JSON string by base64 that is X-COINONE-PAYLOAD. 

import base64

#X-COINONE-PAYLOAD
payload = base64.b64encode(json_param)

Generate X-COINONE-SIGNATURE

SECRET KEY must be upper case.

SIGNATURE = HMAC-SHA512(payload, secret_key.upper()).TO_HEX_DIGEST() 

import hashlib
import hmac

#X-COINONE-SIGNATURE
signature = hmac.new(str(SECRET_KEY).upper(), str(PAYLOAD), hashlib.sha512).hexdigest();

HTTP Request

Request body be equal to X-COINONE-PAYLOAD 

response = client.post(URL,
    format='json',
    data=X-COINONE-PAYLOAD,
    **{
      'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': X-COINONE-PAYLOAD,
      'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': get_signature(X-COINONE-PAYLOAD, SECRET_KEY)
    })

Example : Get balance 

import simplejson as json
import time
import base64
import hashlib
import hmac

ACCESS_TOKEN = ''
SECRET_KEY = ''

def get_encoded_payload(payload):
  #add nonce
  payload[u'nonce'] = int(time.time()*1000)

  dumped_json = json.dumps(payload)
  encoded_json = base64.b64encode(dumped_json)
  return encoded_json

def get_signature(encoded_payload, secret_key):
  signature = hmac.new(str(secret_key).upper(), str(encoded_payload), hashlib.sha512);
  return signature.hexdigest()

def get_response(url, payload):
  encoded_payload = get_encoded_payload(payload)
  response = client.post(APIURL + url,
    format='json',
    data=encoded_payload,
    **{
      'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': encoded_payload,
      'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': get_signature(encoded_payload, SECRET_KEY)
    })
  return response

def get_balance():
  url = '/balance'
  payload = {
    'access_token': ACCESS_TOKEN,
  }

  response = get_response(url, payload)
  content = json.loads(response.content)

  return content

if __name__   == "__main__":
    print get_balance()

Account V2

Account_V2 - BTC Deposit Address - Deprecated

  • compare changes to:
  • 0.1.2

DEPRECATED This API is no longer supported. Now use 'Deposit Address'.

post 
https://api.coinone.co.kr/v2/account/btc_deposit_address/

Permission: User API

  • js
  • python2 
var crypto = require('crypto');
var request = require('request');
var ACCESS_TOKEN = '';
var SECRET_KEY = '';
var url = 'https://api.coinone.co.kr/v2/account/btc_deposit_address/';
  var payload = {
  "access_token": ACCESS_TOKEN,
  "nonce": Date.now()
};

payload = new Buffer(JSON.stringify(payload)).toString('base64');

var signature = crypto
  .createHmac("sha512", SECRET_KEY.toUpperCase())
  .update(payload)
  .digest('hex');

var headers = {
  'content-type':'application/json',
  'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': payload,
  'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': signature
};

var options = {
  url: url,
  headers: headers,
  body: payload
};

request.post(options,
  function(error, response, body) {
    console.log(body);
});
import base64
import simplejson as json
import hashlib
import hmac
import httplib2
import time

ACCESS_TOKEN = ''
SECRET_KEY = ''

URL = 'https://api.coinone.co.kr/v2/account/btc_deposit_address/'
PAYLOAD = {
  "access_token": ACCESS_TOKEN,
}

def get_encoded_payload(payload):
  payload[u'nonce'] = int(time.time()*1000)

  dumped_json = json.dumps(payload)
  encoded_json = base64.b64encode(dumped_json)
  return encoded_json

def get_signature(encoded_payload, secret_key):
  signature = hmac.new(str(secret_key).upper(), str(encoded_payload), hashlib.sha512);
  return signature.hexdigest()

def get_response(url, payload):
  encoded_payload = get_encoded_payload(payload)
  headers = {
    'Content-type': 'application/json',
    'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': encoded_payload,
    'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': get_signature(encoded_payload, SECRET_KEY)
  }
  http = httplib2.Http()
  response, content = http.request(url, 'POST', headers=headers, body=encoded_payload)
  return content

def get_result():
  content = get_response(URL, PAYLOAD)
  content = json.loads(content)

  return content

if __name__   == "__main__":
    print get_result()

Header

Field Description
X-COINONE-PAYLOAD

Parameter object -> JSON string -> base64

X-COINONE-SIGNATURE

HMAC(X-COINONE-PAYLOAD, SECRET_KEY, SHA512).hexdigest()

content-type

Default value: application/json

accept

Default value: application/json

Parameter

Field Type Description
access_token String

User's access_token.

nonce Integer

Increasing any positive integer value.

Success 200

Field Type Description
result String

Request's result.

errorCode String

Error code.

walletAddress String

BTC wallet address.

  • Success-Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
  "errorCode":"0",
  "walletAddress":"mnobqu4i6qMCJWDpf5UimRmr8JCvZ8FLcN",
  "result":"success"
}

import base64
import simplejson as json
import hashlib
import hmac
import httplib2
import time

ACCESS_TOKEN = ''
SECRET_KEY = ''

URL = 'https://api.coinone.co.kr/v2/account/balance/'
PAYLOAD = {
  "access_token": ACCESS_TOKEN,
}

def get_encoded_payload(payload):
  payload[u'nonce'] = int(time.time()*1000)

  dumped_json = json.dumps(payload)
  encoded_json = base64.b64encode(dumped_json)
  return encoded_json

def get_signature(encoded_payload, secret_key):
  signature = hmac.new(str(secret_key).upper(), str(encoded_payload), hashlib.sha512);
  return signature.hexdigest()

def get_response(url, payload):
  encoded_payload = get_encoded_payload(payload)
  headers = {
    'Content-type': 'application/json',
    'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': encoded_payload,
    'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': get_signature(encoded_payload, SECRET_KEY)
  }
  http = httplib2.Http()
  response, content = http.request(url, 'POST', headers=headers, body=encoded_payload)
  return content

def get_result():
  content = get_response(URL, PAYLOAD)
  content = json.loads(content)

  return content

if __name__   == "__main__":
    print get_result()
import base64
import hashlib
import hmac
import json
import time
from urllib.request import urlopen, Request


ACCESS_TOKEN = '{your_access_token}'
SECRET_KEY = '{your_secret_key}'
UPPERCASE_SECRET_KEY = SECRET_KEY.upper()
HOST = 'https://api.coinone.co.kr/'


def get_base_payload():
  return {
    'access_token': ACCESS_TOKEN,
  }


def str_2_byte(s, encode='utf-8'):
  return bytes(s, encode)


def get_encoded_payload(payload):
  payload['nonce'] = int(time.time()*1000)
  dumped_json = json.dumps(payload)
  encoded_json = base64.b64encode(str_2_byte(dumped_json))
  return encoded_json


def get_signature(encoded_payload):
  signature = hmac.new(str_2_byte(UPPERCASE_SECRET_KEY), encoded_payload, hashlib.sha512)
  return signature.hexdigest()


def get_response(url, payload):
  encoded_payload = get_encoded_payload(payload)
  signature = get_signature(encoded_payload)
  headers = {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
    'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': encoded_payload,
    'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': signature,
  }
  api_url = HOST + url
  req = Request(api_url, data=encoded_payload, headers=headers, method='POST')

  with urlopen(req) as res:
    data = res.read().decode('utf-8')
    return json.loads(data)


data = get_response('v2/account/balance/', get_base_payload())
print(data)

Header

Field Description
X-COINONE-PAYLOAD

Parameter object -> JSON string -> base64

X-COINONE-SIGNATURE

HMAC(X-COINONE-PAYLOAD, SECRET_KEY, SHA512).hexdigest()

content-type

Default value: application/json

accept

Default value: application/json

Parameter

Field Type Description
access_token String

User's access_token.

nonce Integer

import base64
import simplejson as json
import hashlib
import hmac
import httplib2
import time

ACCESS_TOKEN = ''
SECRET_KEY = ''

URL = 'https://api.coinone.co.kr/v2/account/balance/'
PAYLOAD = {
  "access_token": ACCESS_TOKEN,
}

def get_encoded_payload(payload):
  payload[u'nonce'] = int(time.time()*1000)

  dumped_json = json.dumps(payload)
  encoded_json = base64.b64encode(dumped_json)
  return encoded_json

def get_signature(encoded_payload, secret_key):
  signature = hmac.new(str(secret_key).upper(), str(encoded_payload), hashlib.sha512);
  return signature.hexdigest()

def get_response(url, payload):
  encoded_payload = get_encoded_payload(payload)
  headers = {
    'Content-type': 'application/json',
    'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': encoded_payload,
    'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': get_signature(encoded_payload, SECRET_KEY)
  }
  http = httplib2.Http()
  response, content = http.request(URL, 'POST', headers=headers, body=encoded_payload)
  return content

def get_result():
  content = get_response(URL, PAYLOAD)
  content = json.loads(content)

  return content

if __name__   == "__main__":
    print get_result()

import base64
import hashlib
import hmac
import json
import time
from urllib.request import urlopen, Request


ACCESS_TOKEN = '{your_access_token}'
SECRET_KEY = '{your_secret_key}'
UPPERCASE_SECRET_KEY = SECRET_KEY.upper()
HOST = 'https://api.coinone.co.kr/'


def get_base_payload():
  return {
    'access_token': ACCESS_TOKEN,
  }


def str_2_byte(s, encode='utf-8'):
  return bytes(s, encode)


def get_encoded_payload(payload):
  payload['nonce'] = int(time.time()*1000)
  dumped_json = json.dumps(payload)
  encoded_json = base64.b64encode(str_2_byte(dumped_json))
  return encoded_json


def get_signature(encoded_payload):
  signature = hmac.new(str_2_byte(UPPERCASE_SECRET_KEY), encoded_payload, hashlib.sha512)
  return signature.hexdigest()


def get_response(url, payload):
  encoded_payload = get_encoded_payload(payload)
  signature = get_signature(encoded_payload)
  headers = {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
    'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': encoded_payload,
    'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': signature,
  }
  api_url = HOST + url
  req = Request(api_url, data=encoded_payload, headers=headers, method='POST')

  with urlopen(req) as res:
    data = res.read().decode('utf-8')
    return json.loads(data)


data = get_response('v2/account/daily_balance/', get_base_payload())
print(data)

import base64
import hashlib
import hmac
import json
import time
from urllib.request import urlopen, Request


ACCESS_TOKEN = '{your_access_token}'
SECRET_KEY = '{your_secret_key}'
UPPERCASE_SECRET_KEY = SECRET_KEY.upper()
HOST = 'https://api.coinone.co.kr/'


def get_base_payload():
  return {
    'access_token': ACCESS_TOKEN,
  }


def str_2_byte(s, encode='utf-8'):
  return bytes(s, encode)


def get_encoded_payload(payload):
  payload['nonce'] = int(time.time()*1000)
  dumped_json = json.dumps(payload)
  encoded_json = base64.b64encode(str_2_byte(dumped_json))
  return encoded_json


def get_signature(encoded_payload):
  signature = hmac.new(str_2_byte(UPPERCASE_SECRET_KEY), encoded_payload, hashlib.sha512)
  return signature.hexdigest()


def get_response(url, payload):
  encoded_payload = get_encoded_payload(payload)
  signature = get_signature(encoded_payload)
  headers = {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
    'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': encoded_payload,
    'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': signature,
  }
  api_url = HOST + url
  req = Request(api_url, data=encoded_payload, headers=headers, method='POST')

  with urlopen(req) as res:
    data = res.read().decode('utf-8')
    return json.loads(data)


data = get_response('v2/account/deposit_address/', get_base_payload())
print(data)

def get_response(url, payload):
  encoded_payload = get_encoded_payload(payload)
  signature = get_signature(encoded_payload)
  headers = {
      'Content-Type': 'application/json',
      'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': encoded_payload,
      'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': signature,
  }
  api_url = HOST + url
  req = Request(api_url, data=encoded_payload, headers=headers, method='POST')

  with urlopen(req) as res:
      data = res.read().decode('utf-8')
      return json.loads(data)


data = get_response('v2/account/user_info/', get_base_payload())
print(data)

  var payload = {
  "access_token": ACCESS_TOKEN,
  "nonce": Date.now()
};

  .createHmac("sha512", SECRET_KEY.toUpperCase())
  .update(payload)

import base64
import simplejson as json
import hashlib
import hmac
import httplib2
import time

ACCESS_TOKEN = ''
SECRET_KEY = ''

URL = 'https://api.coinone.co.kr/v2/account/user_info/'
PAYLOAD = {
  "access_token": ACCESS_TOKEN,
}

def get_encoded_payload(payload):
  payload[u'nonce'] = int(time.time()*1000)

  dumped_json = json.dumps(payload)
  encoded_json = base64.b64encode(dumped_json)
  return encoded_json

def get_signature(encoded_payload, secret_key):
  signature = hmac.new(str(secret_key).upper(), str(encoded_payload), hashlib.sha512);
  return signature.hexdigest()

def get_response(url, payload):
  encoded_payload = get_encoded_payload(payload)
  headers = {
    'Content-type': 'application/json',
    'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': encoded_payload,
    'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': get_signature(encoded_payload, SECRET_KEY)
  }
  http = httplib2.Http()
  response, content = http.request(URL, 'POST', headers=headers, body=encoded_payload)
  return content

def get_result():
  content = get_response(URL, PAYLOAD)
  content = json.loads(content)

  return content

if __name__   == "__main__":
    print get_result()

Account_V2 - Virtual Account

  • compare changes to:
  • 0.1.2
post 
https://api.coinone.co.kr/v2/account/virtual_account/

Permission: User API

  • js
  • python2
  • python3.6+ 
var crypto = require('crypto');
var request = require('request');
var ACCESS_TOKEN = '';
var SECRET_KEY = '';
var url = 'https://api.coinone.co.kr/v2/account/virtual_account/';
  var payload = {
  "access_token": ACCESS_TOKEN,
  "nonce": Date.now()
};

payload = new Buffer(JSON.stringify(payload)).toString('base64');

var signature = crypto
  .createHmac("sha512", SECRET_KEY.toUpperCase())
  .update(payload)
  .digest('hex');

var headers = {
  'content-type':'application/json',
  'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': payload,
  'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': signature
};

var options = {
  url: url,
  headers: headers,
  body: payload
};

request.post(options,
  function(error, response, body) {
    console.log(body);
});
import base64
import simplejson as json
import hashlib
import hmac
import httplib2
import time

ACCESS_TOKEN = ''
SECRET_KEY = ''

URL = 'https://api.coinone.co.kr/v2/account/virtual_account/'
PAYLOAD = {
  "access_token": ACCESS_TOKEN,
}

def get_encoded_payload(payload):
  payload[u'nonce'] = int(time.time()*1000)

  dumped_json = json.dumps(payload)
  encoded_json = base64.b64encode(dumped_json)
  return encoded_json

def get_signature(encoded_payload, secret_key):
  signature = hmac.new(str(secret_key).upper(), str(encoded_payload), hashlib.sha512);
  return signature.hexdigest()

def get_response(url, payload):
  encoded_payload = get_encoded_payload(payload)
  headers = {
    'Content-type': 'application/json',
    'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': encoded_payload,
    'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': get_signature(encoded_payload, SECRET_KEY)
  }
  http = httplib2.Http()
  response, content = http.request(url, 'POST', headers=headers, body=encoded_payload)
  return content

def get_result():
  content = get_response(URL, PAYLOAD)
  content = json.loads(content)

  return content

if __name__   == "__main__":
    print get_result()
import base64
import hashlib
import hmac
import json
import time
from urllib.request import urlopen, Request


ACCESS_TOKEN = '{your_access_token}'
SECRET_KEY = '{your_secret_key}'
UPPERCASE_SECRET_KEY = SECRET_KEY.upper()
HOST = 'https://api.coinone.co.kr/'


def get_base_payload():
  return {
    'access_token': ACCESS_TOKEN,
  }


def str_2_byte(s, encode='utf-8'):
  return bytes(s, encode)


def get_encoded_payload(payload):
  payload['nonce'] = int(time.time()*1000)
  dumped_json = json.dumps(payload)
  encoded_json = base64.b64encode(str_2_byte(dumped_json))
  return encoded_json


def get_signature(encoded_payload):
  signature = hmac.new(str_2_byte(UPPERCASE_SECRET_KEY), encoded_payload, hashlib.sha512)
  return signature.hexdigest()


def get_response(url, payload):
  encoded_payload = get_encoded_payload(payload)
  signature = get_signature(encoded_payload)
  headers = {
      'Content-Type': 'application/json',
      'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': encoded_payload,
      'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': signature,
  }
  api_url = HOST + url
  req = Request(api_url, data=encoded_payload, headers=headers, method='POST')

  with urlopen(req) as res:
      data = res.read().decode('utf-8')
      return json.loads(data)


data = get_response('v2/account/virtual_account/', get_base_payload())
print(data)

var crypto = require('crypto');

  var payload = {
  "access_token": ACCESS_TOKEN,
  "currency": "btc",
  "nonce": Date.now()
};

var signature = crypto
  .createHmac("sha512", SECRET_KEY.toUpperCase())
  .update(payload)
  .digest('hex');

var headers = {
  'content-type':'application/json',
  'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': payload,
  'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': signature

  headers: headers,
  body: payload
};

  function(error, response, body) {
    console.log(body);
});
import base64
import simplejson as json
import hashlib
import hmac
import httplib2
import time

ACCESS_TOKEN = ''
SECRET_KEY = ''

URL = 'https://api.coinone.co.kr/v2/order/cancel_all/'
PAYLOAD = {
  "access_token": ACCESS_TOKEN,
  "currency": "btc"
}

def get_encoded_payload(payload):
  payload[u'nonce'] = int(time.time()*1000)

  dumped_json = json.dumps(payload)
  encoded_json = base64.b64encode(dumped_json)
  return encoded_json

def get_signature(encoded_payload, secret_key):
  signature = hmac.new(str(secret_key).upper(), str(encoded_payload), hashlib.sha512);
  return signature.hexdigest()

def get_response(url, payload):
  encoded_payload = get_encoded_payload(payload)
  headers = {
    'Content-type': 'application/json',
    'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': encoded_payload,
    'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': get_signature(encoded_payload, SECRET_KEY)
  }
  http = httplib2.Http()
  response, content = http.request(url, 'POST', headers=headers, body=encoded_payload)
  return content

def get_result():
  content = get_response(URL, PAYLOAD)
  content = json.loads(content)

  return content

if __name__   == "__main__":
    print get_result()

Header

Field Description
X-COINONE-PAYLOAD

Parameter object -> JSON string -> base64

X-COINONE-SIGNATURE

HMAC(X-COINONE-PAYLOAD, SECRET_KEY, SHA512).hexdigest()

content-type

Default value: application/json

accept

Default value: application/json

Parameter

Field Type Description
access_token String

User's access_token.

currency String

Currency

Default value: btc

Allowed values: btc , eth , etc

nonce Integer

Increasing any positive integer value.

Success 200

Field Type Description
result String

Request's result.

errorCode String

Error code.

successCanceledOrders Int

The number of canceled orders.

overallOrders Int

The number of overall orders before canceled.

  • Success-Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
  "errorCode": "0",
  "result": "success",
  "successCanceledOrders": "4",
  "overallOrders": "4"
}

import base64
import hashlib
import hmac
import json
import time
from urllib.request import urlopen, Request

ACCESS_TOKEN = '{your_access_token}'
SECRET_KEY = '{your_secret_key}'
UPPERCASE_SECRET_KEY = SECRET_KEY.upper()
HOST = 'https://api.coinone.co.kr/'


def get_base_payload():
  return {
    'access_token': ACCESS_TOKEN,
  }


def str_2_byte(s, encode='utf-8'):
  return bytes(s, encode)


def get_encoded_payload(payload):
  payload['nonce'] = int(time.time() * 1000)
  dumped_json = json.dumps(payload)
  encoded_json = base64.b64encode(str_2_byte(dumped_json))
  return encoded_json


def get_signature(encoded_payload):
  signature = hmac.new(str_2_byte(UPPERCASE_SECRET_KEY), encoded_payload, hashlib.sha512)
  return signature.hexdigest()


def get_response(url, payload):
  encoded_payload = get_encoded_payload(payload)
  signature = get_signature(encoded_payload)
  headers = {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
    'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': encoded_payload,
    'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': signature,
  }
  api_url = HOST + url
  req = Request(api_url, data=encoded_payload, headers=headers, method='POST')

  with urlopen(req) as res:
    data = res.read().decode('utf-8')
    return json.loads(data)


def create_payload(data):
  payload = get_base_payload()
  payload.update(data)
  return payload


data = get_response('v2/order/cancel/', create_payload({
  'order_id': "{order_id}",
  'price': 50000000,
  'qty': 0.1,
  'currency': 'btc',
  'is_ask': 0,
}))
print(data)

Parameter object -> JSON string -> base64

content-type

Default value: application/json

accept

Default value: application/json

Parameter

User's access_token.

order_id String

Order's id.

price Long

KRW price.

qty Double

BTC/BCH/ETH/ETC/XRP/QTUM/IOTA/LTC/BTG/OMG/EOS/DATA quantity.

is_ask Int

1 if order is sell.

currency String

Currency

Default value: btc

Allowed values: btc , bch , eth , etc , xrp , qtum , iota , ltc , btg , omg , eos , data , zil , knc , zrx , xtz

nonce Integer

Increasing any positive integer value.

import base64
import hashlib
import hmac
import json
import time
from urllib.request import urlopen, Request


ACCESS_TOKEN = '{your_access_token}'
SECRET_KEY = '{your_secret_key}'
UPPERCASE_SECRET_KEY = SECRET_KEY.upper()
HOST = 'https://api.coinone.co.kr/'


def get_base_payload():
  return {
    'access_token': ACCESS_TOKEN,
  }


def str_2_byte(s, encode='utf-8'):
  return bytes(s, encode)


def get_encoded_payload(payload):
  payload['nonce'] = int(time.time()*1000)
  dumped_json = json.dumps(payload)
  encoded_json = base64.b64encode(str_2_byte(dumped_json))
  return encoded_json


def get_signature(encoded_payload):
  signature = hmac.new(str_2_byte(UPPERCASE_SECRET_KEY), encoded_payload, hashlib.sha512)
  return signature.hexdigest()


def get_response(url, payload):
  encoded_payload = get_encoded_payload(payload)
  signature = get_signature(encoded_payload)
  headers = {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
    'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': encoded_payload,
    'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': signature,
  }
  api_url = HOST + url
  req = Request(api_url, data=encoded_payload, headers=headers, method='POST')

  with urlopen(req) as res:
    data = res.read().decode('utf-8')
    return json.loads(data)


payload = get_base_payload()
payload.update({
  'price': 50000,
  'qty': 0.1,
  'currency': 'btc'
})
data = get_response('v2/order/limit_buy/', payload)
print(data)

Header

Field Description
X-COINONE-PAYLOAD

Parameter object -> JSON string -> base64

X-COINONE-SIGNATURE

HMAC(X-COINONE-PAYLOAD, SECRET_KEY, SHA512).hexdigest()

content-type

Default value: application/json

accept

Default value: application/json

Parameter

Field Type Description
access_token String

User's access_token.

price Long

KRW price.

qty Double

BTC/BCH/ETH/ETC/XRP/QTUM/IOTA/LTC/BTG/OMG/EOS/DATA quantity.

currency String

Currency

Default value: btc

Allowed values: btc , bch , eth , etc , xrp , qtum , iota , ltc , btg , omg , eos , data , zil , knc , zrx , xtz

nonce Integer

Increasing any positive integer value.

Success 200

Field Type Description
result String

Request's result.

orderId String

Order ID.

errorCode String

Error code.

  • Success-Response: 
HTTP/1.1 200 OK

  "errorCode": "0",
  "orderId": "8a82c561-40b4-4cb3-9bc0-9ac9ffc1d63b",
  "result": "success",

    'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': signature,
  }
  api_url = HOST + url
  req = Request(api_url, data=encoded_payload, headers=headers, method='POST')

  with urlopen(req) as res:
    data = res.read().decode('utf-8')
    return json.loads(data)


def create_payload(data):
  payload = get_base_payload()
  payload.update(data)
  return payload


data = get_response('v2/order/limit_sell/', create_payload({
  'price': 50000000,
  'qty': 0.1,
  'currency': 'btc',
}))
print(data)

import base64
import simplejson as json
import hashlib
import hmac
import httplib2
import time

ACCESS_TOKEN = ''
SECRET_KEY = ''

URL = 'https://api.coinone.co.kr/v2/order/limit_sell/'
PAYLOAD = {
  "access_token": ACCESS_TOKEN,
  "price": 500000,
  "qty": 0.1,
  "currency": "btc"
}

def get_encoded_payload(payload):
  payload[u'nonce'] = int(time.time()*1000)

  dumped_json = json.dumps(payload)
  encoded_json = base64.b64encode(dumped_json)
  return encoded_json

def get_signature(encoded_payload, secret_key):
  signature = hmac.new(str(secret_key).upper(), str(encoded_payload), hashlib.sha512);
  return signature.hexdigest()

def get_response(url, payload):
  encoded_payload = get_encoded_payload(payload)
  headers = {
    'Content-type': 'application/json',
    'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': encoded_payload,
    'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': get_signature(encoded_payload, SECRET_KEY)
  }
  http = httplib2.Http()
  response, content = http.request(URL, 'POST', headers=headers, body=encoded_payload)
  return content

def get_result():
  content = get_response(URL, PAYLOAD)
  content = json.loads(content)

  return content

if __name__   == "__main__":
    print get_result()

import base64
import simplejson as json
import hashlib
import hmac
import httplib2
import time

ACCESS_TOKEN = ''
SECRET_KEY = ''

URL = 'https://api.coinone.co.kr/v2/order/market_sell/'
PAYLOAD = {
  "access_token": ACCESS_TOKEN,
  "qty": 0.1,
}

def get_encoded_payload(payload):
  payload[u'nonce'] = int(time.time()*1000)

  dumped_json = json.dumps(payload)
  encoded_json = base64.b64encode(dumped_json)
  return encoded_json

def get_signature(encoded_payload, secret_key):
  signature = hmac.new(str(secret_key).upper(), str(encoded_payload), hashlib.sha512);
  return signature.hexdigest()

def get_response(url, payload):
  encoded_payload = get_encoded_payload(payload)
  headers = {
    'Content-type': 'application/json',
    'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': encoded_payload,
    'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': get_signature(encoded_payload, SECRET_KEY)
  }
  http = httplib2.Http()
  response, content = http.request(URL, 'POST', headers=headers, body=encoded_payload)
  return content

def get_result():
  content = get_response(URL, PAYLOAD)
  content = json.loads(content)

  return content

if __name__   == "__main__":
    print get_result()

import base64
import hashlib
import hmac
import json
import time
from urllib.request import urlopen, Request

ACCESS_TOKEN = '{your_access_token}'
SECRET_KEY = '{your_secret_key}'
UPPERCASE_SECRET_KEY = SECRET_KEY.upper()
HOST = 'https://api.coinone.co.kr/'


def get_base_payload():
  return {
    'access_token': ACCESS_TOKEN,
  }


def str_2_byte(s, encode='utf-8'):
  return bytes(s, encode)


def get_encoded_payload(payload):
  payload['nonce'] = int(time.time() * 1000)
  dumped_json = json.dumps(payload)
  encoded_json = base64.b64encode(str_2_byte(dumped_json))
  return encoded_json


def get_signature(encoded_payload):
  signature = hmac.new(str_2_byte(UPPERCASE_SECRET_KEY), encoded_payload, hashlib.sha512)
  return signature.hexdigest()


def get_response(url, payload):
  encoded_payload = get_encoded_payload(payload)
  signature = get_signature(encoded_payload)
  headers = {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
    'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': encoded_payload,
    'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': signature,
  }
  api_url = HOST + url
  req = Request(api_url, data=encoded_payload, headers=headers, method='POST')

  with urlopen(req) as res:
    data = res.read().decode('utf-8')
    return json.loads(data)


def create_payload(data):
  payload = get_base_payload()
  payload.update(data)
  return payload


data = get_response('v2/order/complete_orders/', create_payload({
  'currency': 'btc',
}))
print(data)

  signature = hmac.new(str(secret_key).upper(), str(encoded_payload), hashlib.sha512);
  return signature.hexdigest()

def get_response(url, payload):
  encoded_payload = get_encoded_payload(payload)
  headers = {
    'Content-type': 'application/json',
    'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': encoded_payload,
    'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': get_signature(encoded_payload, SECRET_KEY)
  }
  http = httplib2.Http()
  response, content = http.request(URL, 'POST', headers=headers, body=encoded_payload)
  return content

def get_result():
  content = get_response(URL, PAYLOAD)
  content = json.loads(content)

  return content

if __name__   == "__main__":
    print get_result()

  "access_token": ACCESS_TOKEN,
}

  payload[u'nonce'] = int(time.time()*1000)

  dumped_json = json.dumps(payload)
  encoded_json = base64.b64encode(dumped_json)
  return encoded_json

  signature = hmac.new(str(secret_key).upper(), str(encoded_payload), hashlib.sha512);
  return signature.hexdigest()

import base64
import hashlib
import hmac
import json
import time
from urllib.request import urlopen, Request

ACCESS_TOKEN = '{your_access_token}'
SECRET_KEY = '{your_secret_key}'
UPPERCASE_SECRET_KEY = SECRET_KEY.upper()
HOST = 'https://api.coinone.co.kr/'


def get_base_payload():
  return {
    'access_token': ACCESS_TOKEN,
  }


def str_2_byte(s, encode='utf-8'):
  return bytes(s, encode)


def get_encoded_payload(payload):
  payload['nonce'] = int(time.time() * 1000)
  dumped_json = json.dumps(payload)
  encoded_json = base64.b64encode(str_2_byte(dumped_json))
  return encoded_json


def get_signature(encoded_payload):
  signature = hmac.new(str_2_byte(UPPERCASE_SECRET_KEY), encoded_payload, hashlib.sha512)
  return signature.hexdigest()


def get_response(url, payload):
  encoded_payload = get_encoded_payload(payload)
  signature = get_signature(encoded_payload)
  headers = {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
    'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': encoded_payload,
    'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': signature,
  }
  api_url = HOST + url
  req = Request(api_url, data=encoded_payload, headers=headers, method='POST')

  with urlopen(req) as res:
    data = res.read().decode('utf-8')
    return json.loads(data)


def create_payload(data):
  payload = get_base_payload()
  payload.update(data)
  return payload


data = get_response('v2/order/limit_orders/', create_payload({
  'currency': 'btc',
}))
print(data)

import base64
import simplejson as json
import hashlib
import hmac
import httplib2
import time

ACCESS_TOKEN = ''
SECRET_KEY = ''

URL = 'https://api.coinone.co.kr/v2/order/limit_orders/'
PAYLOAD = {
  "access_token": ACCESS_TOKEN,
}

def get_encoded_payload(payload):
  payload[u'nonce'] = int(time.time()*1000)

  dumped_json = json.dumps(payload)
  encoded_json = base64.b64encode(dumped_json)
  return encoded_json

def get_signature(encoded_payload, secret_key):
  signature = hmac.new(str(secret_key).upper(), str(encoded_payload), hashlib.sha512);
  return signature.hexdigest()

def get_response(url, payload):
  encoded_payload = get_encoded_payload(payload)
  headers = {
    'Content-type': 'application/json',
    'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': encoded_payload,
    'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': get_signature(encoded_payload, SECRET_KEY)
  }
  http = httplib2.Http()
  response, content = http.request(URL, 'POST', headers=headers, body=encoded_payload)
  return content

def get_result():
  content = get_response(URL, PAYLOAD)
  content = json.loads(content)

  return content

if __name__   == "__main__":
    print get_result()

import base64
import hashlib
import hmac
import json
import time
from urllib.request import urlopen, Request

ACCESS_TOKEN = '{your_access_token}'
SECRET_KEY = '{your_secret_key}'
UPPERCASE_SECRET_KEY = SECRET_KEY.upper()
HOST = 'https://api.coinone.co.kr/'


def get_base_payload():
  return {
    'access_token': ACCESS_TOKEN,
  }


def str_2_byte(s, encode='utf-8'):
  return bytes(s, encode)


def get_encoded_payload(payload):
  payload['nonce'] = int(time.time() * 1000)
  dumped_json = json.dumps(payload)
  encoded_json = base64.b64encode(str_2_byte(dumped_json))
  return encoded_json


def get_signature(encoded_payload):
  signature = hmac.new(str_2_byte(UPPERCASE_SECRET_KEY), encoded_payload, hashlib.sha512)
  return signature.hexdigest()


def get_response(url, payload):
  encoded_payload = get_encoded_payload(payload)
  signature = get_signature(encoded_payload)
  headers = {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
    'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': encoded_payload,
    'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': signature,
  }
  api_url = HOST + url
  req = Request(api_url, data=encoded_payload, headers=headers, method='POST')

  with urlopen(req) as res:
    data = res.read().decode('utf-8')
    return json.loads(data)


def create_payload(data):
  payload = get_base_payload()
  payload.update(data)
  return payload


data = get_response('v2/order/order_info/', create_payload({
  'order_id': 'a06de5d0-b2cd-4064-be88-334f06b0b0c9',
  'currency': 'btc',
}))
print(data)

Parameter

Field Type Description
currency String

Coin type.

Default value: btc

Allowed values: btc , bch , eth , etc , xrp , qtum , iota , ltc , btg , omg , eos , data , zil , knc , zrx , xtz , all

Success 200

Field Type Description
result String

Request's result.

errorCode String

Error code.

high Long

Highest price in today.

low Long

Lowest price in today.

last Long

Price at request.

first Long

First price in today.

volume Double

Coin volume of completed orders in 24 hours.

yesterday_high Long

Highest price during for yesterday.

yesterday_low Long

Lowest price during for yesterday.

yesterday_last Long

Price at request before yesterday.

yesterday_first Long

First price during for yesterday.

yesterday_volume Double

Coin volume of completed orders during for 24 ~ 48 hours.

timestmap Long

Timestamp.

currency String

Currency.

  • Success-Response:

Field Type Description

Field Type Description

  • compare changes to:
  • 0.1.8

  • 0.1.0

  • CAUTION: ONLY OTP USER CAN USE THIS API.

Field Type Description

2-Factor Authentication number.

BTC quantity.

from_address String

User's wallet address

Success 200

Field Type Description
result String

Request's result.

errorCode String

Error code.

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
  "errorCode": "0",
  "result": "success",
}

Transaction - Send BTC

  • compare changes to:
  • 0.1.8
  • 0.1.1
  • 0.1.0

Send BTC. To use this request, a user should be given a 2-factor authentication's number from /v1/transaction/auth_number/ first. If a user doesn't mobile authentication, just put auth_number to 0. In other case, put auth_number to received 2-factor authentication's number.

import base64
import simplejson as json
import hashlib
import hmac
import httplib2
import time

ACCESS_TOKEN = ''
SECRET_KEY = ''

URL = 'https://api.coinone.co.kr/v2/transaction/auth_number/'
PAYLOAD = {
  "access_token": ACCESS_TOKEN,
  "type": "btc",
}

def get_encoded_payload(payload):
  payload[u'nonce'] = int(time.time()*1000)

  dumped_json = json.dumps(payload)
  encoded_json = base64.b64encode(dumped_json)
  return encoded_json

def get_signature(encoded_payload, secret_key):
  signature = hmac.new(str(secret_key).upper(), str(encoded_payload), hashlib.sha512);
  return signature.hexdigest()

def get_response(url, payload):
  encoded_payload = get_encoded_payload(payload)
  headers = {
    'Content-type': 'application/json',
    'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': encoded_payload,
    'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': get_signature(encoded_payload, SECRET_KEY)
  }
  http = httplib2.Http()
  response, content = http.request(url, 'POST', headers=headers, body=encoded_payload)
  return content

def get_result():
  content = get_response(URL, PAYLOAD)
  content = json.loads(content)

  return content

if __name__   == "__main__":
    print get_result()
import base64
import hashlib
import hmac
import json
import time
from urllib.request import urlopen, Request

ACCESS_TOKEN = '{your_access_token}'
SECRET_KEY = '{your_secret_key}'
UPPERCASE_SECRET_KEY = SECRET_KEY.upper()
HOST = 'https://api.coinone.co.kr/'


def get_base_payload():
  return {
    'access_token': ACCESS_TOKEN,
  }


def str_2_byte(s, encode='utf-8'):
  return bytes(s, encode)


def get_encoded_payload(payload):
  payload['nonce'] = int(time.time() * 1000)
  dumped_json = json.dumps(payload)
  encoded_json = base64.b64encode(str_2_byte(dumped_json))
  return encoded_json


def get_signature(encoded_payload):
  signature = hmac.new(str_2_byte(UPPERCASE_SECRET_KEY), encoded_payload, hashlib.sha512)
  return signature.hexdigest()


def get_response(url, payload):
  encoded_payload = get_encoded_payload(payload)
  signature = get_signature(encoded_payload)
  headers = {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
    'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': encoded_payload,
    'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': signature,
  }
  api_url = HOST + url
  req = Request(api_url, data=encoded_payload, headers=headers, method='POST')

  with urlopen(req) as res:
    data = res.read().decode('utf-8')
    return json.loads(data)


def create_payload(data):
  payload = get_base_payload()
  payload.update(data)
  return payload


data = get_response('v2/transaction/auth_number/', create_payload({
  'type': 'btc',
}))
print(data)

Field Description

Parameter object -> JSON string -> base64

X-COINONE-SIGNATURE

HMAC(X-COINONE-PAYLOAD, SECRET_KEY, SHA512).hexdigest()

content-type

Default value: application/json

accept

Default value: application/json

Parameter

Field Type Description

User's access_token.

type String

Authentication Type.

Allowed values: krw , btc , bch , eth , etc , xrp , qtum , iota , ltc

nonce Integer

Increasing any positive integer value.

Success 200

import base64
import simplejson as json
import hashlib
import hmac
import httplib2
import time

ACCESS_TOKEN = ''
SECRET_KEY = ''

URL = 'https://api.coinone.co.kr/v2/transaction/history/'
PAYLOAD = {
  "access_token": ACCESS_TOKEN,
  "currency": "btc"
}

def get_encoded_payload(payload):
  payload[u'nonce'] = int(time.time()*1000)

  dumped_json = json.dumps(payload)
  encoded_json = base64.b64encode(dumped_json)
  return encoded_json

def get_signature(encoded_payload, secret_key):
  signature = hmac.new(str(secret_key).upper(), str(encoded_payload), hashlib.sha512);
  return signature.hexdigest()

def get_response(url, payload):
  encoded_payload = get_encoded_payload(payload)
  headers = {
    'Content-type': 'application/json',
    'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': encoded_payload,
    'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': get_signature(encoded_payload, SECRET_KEY)
  }
  http = httplib2.Http()
  response, content = http.request(URL, 'POST', headers=headers, body=encoded_payload)
  return content

def get_result():
  content = get_response(URL, PAYLOAD)
  content = json.loads(content)

  return content

if __name__   == "__main__":
    print get_result()

Header

Field Description
X-COINONE-PAYLOAD

Parameter object -> JSON string -> base64

X-COINONE-SIGNATURE

HMAC(X-COINONE-PAYLOAD, SECRET_KEY, SHA512).hexdigest()

content-type

Default value: application/json

accept

Default value: application/json

Parameter

Field Type Description
access_token String

User's access_token.

currency String

Currency.

Allowed values: btc , bch , eth , etc , xrp , qtum

nonce Integer

Increasing any positive integer value.

Success 200

Field Type Description
result String

Request's result.

errorCode String

Error code.

transactions Object[]

Coin transactions history.

txid String

Transaction ID.

type String

Transaction type. send: "send", receive: "receive".

from String

From address.

to String

To address.

confirmations Int

Confirmations.

quantity Double

Transaction quantity.

Timestamp.

import base64
import hashlib
import hmac
import json
import time
from urllib.request import urlopen, Request

ACCESS_TOKEN = '{your_access_token}'
SECRET_KEY = '{your_secret_key}'
UPPERCASE_SECRET_KEY = SECRET_KEY.upper()
HOST = 'https://api.coinone.co.kr/'


def get_base_payload():
  return {
    'access_token': ACCESS_TOKEN,
  }


def str_2_byte(s, encode='utf-8'):
  return bytes(s, encode)


def get_encoded_payload(payload):
  payload['nonce'] = int(time.time() * 1000)
  dumped_json = json.dumps(payload)
  encoded_json = base64.b64encode(str_2_byte(dumped_json))
  return encoded_json


def get_signature(encoded_payload):
  signature = hmac.new(str_2_byte(UPPERCASE_SECRET_KEY), encoded_payload, hashlib.sha512)
  return signature.hexdigest()


def get_response(url, payload):
  encoded_payload = get_encoded_payload(payload)
  signature = get_signature(encoded_payload)
  headers = {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
    'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': encoded_payload,
    'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': signature,
  }
  api_url = HOST + url
  req = Request(api_url, data=encoded_payload, headers=headers, method='POST')

  with urlopen(req) as res:
    data = res.read().decode('utf-8')
    return json.loads(data)


def create_payload(data):
  payload = get_base_payload()
  payload.update(data)
  return payload


data = get_response('v2/transaction/krw/history/', get_base_payload())
print(data)

Transaction_V2 - Send BTC

  • compare changes to:
  • 0.1.3
  • 0.1.2

Sending BTC. To use this request, a user should be given a 2-factor authentication's number from /v2/transaction/auth_number/ first.

  • CAUTION: ONLY OTP USER CAN USE THIS API.

post 
https://api.coinone.co.kr/v2/transaction/btc/

Permission: Withdraw BTC

  • js
  • python 
var crypto = require('crypto');
var request = require('request');
var ACCESS_TOKEN = '';
var SECRET_KEY = '';
var url = 'https://api.coinone.co.kr/v2/transaction/btc/';
var payload = {
  "access_token": ACCESS_TOKEN,
  "address": "receiver address",
  "auth_number": 123456,
  "qty": 0.1,
  "type": "trade",
  "from_address": "trade wallet address",
  "nonce": Date.now()
};

payload = new Buffer(JSON.stringify(payload)).toString('base64');

var signature = crypto
  .createHmac("sha512", SECRET_KEY.toUpperCase())
  .update(payload)
  .digest('hex');

var headers = {
  'content-type':'application/json',
  'X-COINONE-PAYLOAD': payload,
  'X-COINONE-SIGNATURE': signature
};

var options = {
  url: url,
  headers: headers,
  body: payload
};

request.post(options,
  function(error, response, body) {
    console.log(body);
});

  "from_address": "trade wallet address",
}

  • compare changes to:
  • 0.1.3
  • 0.1.2

Sending BTC. To use this request, a user should be given a 2-factor authentication's number from /v2/transaction/auth_number/ first. If a user doesn't mobile authentication, just put auth_number to 0. In other case, put auth_number to received 2-factor authentication's number.
